abilities.name: deadly venom
abilities.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

abilities.name: ambush
abilities.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.

abilities.name: venom cask
abilities.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

abilities.name: contaminate
abilities.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

abilities.name: spray and pray
abilities.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
